name: Olivia (MarsRamirez)
description:
Olivia is an interactive narrative where you play a girl named Olivia who lives with her best friend since childhood, Dylan. The two were just about inseparable growing up. Dylan and Olivia graduated high school together and share a traumatic experience that bonds them for life.  They move in together and get jobs at the same organic grocery store called Sonny's. While Olivia channels her energy into her work, Dylan is more inclined to drink and smoke his worries away. 

  • Multiple Pathways and Combinations
  • Three Alternative Endings
  • Text-Based Roleplay-Style Gameplay
  • Variety of Action and Dialogue Choices 
  • Sounds and Photos
  • 30-45 Minutes Long
